gpt-4o.prompt: Act as a professional Instagram editor. Improve the following post: {post} and include these hashtags: {hashtags}

gemini-pro.prompt: You are a social media expert. Refine this Instagram content: {post} using the following hashtags: {hashtags}

gpt-4o.prompt: Generate a review for {product_name} with a rating of {rating} stars.

gemini-pro.prompt: You are a review expert. Write a {rating}-star review of {product_name}.

mistral.prompt: Write a {rating}-star review of {product_name}. Focus on: {features}.
